en: Hold not thy peace, O God of my praise;
hmr: Aw kan inpâk Pathien, to zing naw la,

en: For the mouth of the wicked and the mouth of deceit have they opened against me: They have spoken unto me with a lying tongue.
hmr: Mi rilo bau le bau mi hlêm- hmang chu ka chungah an ka sih a; Anni chun lei khêlinhlipin ka kuomah thu an hril a.

en: They have compassed me about also with words of hatred, And fought against me without a cause.
hmr: Theidâna thuin a mîn huol vêl a, Ieng ni bar loin an mi do a.

en: For my love they are my adversaries: But I give myself unto prayer.
hmr: Ka lunginsiet leiin a mi dotuhai an hung ni tah a; Nisienlakhawm, kei chu ṭawng- ṭâi dingin kân pêk tlat a.

en: And they have rewarded me evil for good, And hatred for my love.
hmr: Anni chun thil ṭha chu thil suolin an mi thung a, Ka hmangaina chu theidanain an mi thung bawk a.

en: Set thou a wicked man over him; And let an adversary stand at his right hand.
hmr: Nangin a chungah mi suol sie la, A changtieng chun hêktu ngîr raw se.

en: When he is judged, let him come forth guilty; And let his prayer be turned into sin.
hmr: Rorêlpêka a um pha thiemlo changin suok sienla, A ṭawngṭâina suolnaah inchang raw se.

en: Let his days be few; And let another take his office.
hmr: A dam sûng nihai chu hung tlâwm sienla, A hotu nina chu mi dangin chang raw se.

en: Let his children be fatherless, And his wife a widow.
hmr: A nauhai chu pa boin um sienla, A nuhmei chu hmeithaiin um bawk raw se;

en: Let his children be vagabonds, and beg; And let them seek their bread out of their desolate places.
hmr: A nauhai chu mi invâi hung niin kut daw sienla, An fâk ding chu an hmun hluihaia chun zawng raw se.

en: Let the extortioner catch all that he hath; And let strangers make spoil of his labor.
hmr: A pung hnawta tangka inpûk- tirtu chun a nei po po chu lâkpêk vawng sienla, Mikhuolhai chun a sininrim ra chu lâkpêk raw hai se.

en: Let there be none to extend kindness unto him; Neither let there be any to have pity on his fatherless children.
hmr: A chunga ngilneina inlangtir pei dingtu tukhawm um naw sienla, A nau, pa bohai chu lunginsiet- tu ding tukhawm um bawk naw raw se.

en: Let his posterity be cut off; In the generation following let their name be blotted out.
hmr: A thlahai chu sukbohmangin um sienla, Ruolthar hung um nâwka chun an hming chu thai hmangin um raw se.

en: Let the iniquity of his fathers be remembered with Jehovah; And let not the sin of his mother be blotted out.
hmr: A thlatuhai rîtlona chu LALPA kuomah hriet zingin um sien la, A nu suolna chu thai hmangin um naw raw se.

en: Let them be before Jehovah continually, That he may cut off the memory of them from the earth;
hmr: Chuonghai chu LALPA hmaah um naw sienla, Ama chun anni hriet zingna chu hnuoia inthawka a sukbo theina dingin.

en: Because he remembered not to show kindness, But persecuted the poor and needy man, And the broken in heart, to slay them.
hmr: Zâinêmna inlangtir nachâng a hriet nawh a, Mi rimsi, pasie le lungriem ithlâkhai chu sukhlum tuma, a suknawmna lem hlak leiin.

en: Yea, he loved cursing, and it came unto him; And he delighted not in blessing, and it was far from him.
hmr: Anih, mi ṭawngse inphur hi a nuom zawng a na; chuongchun, ama chungah a hung tlung a, Mi malsâwmpêk hi a lâwm- zâwng a ni nawh a; chuong- chun, ama ihlat daiah a um a.

en: He clothed himself also with cursing as with his garment, And it came into his inward parts like water, And like oil into his bones.
hmr: Kawrfuola inthuom angin, ṭawngse inphurnain ân thuom a, Chu chu a sûngahai chun tui angin a lût a, A ruhaia chun hriek angin a lût bawk a.

en: Let it be unto him as the raiment wherewith he covereth himself, And for the girdle wherewith he is girded continually.
hmr: Chu chu a ta dingin ân belna hlak silfên angin um sienla, A în khit rawpna kâwngkhi ni bawk raw se.

en: This is the reward of mine adversaries from Jehovah, And of them that speak evil against my soul.
hmr: Chuong chu a mi dotuhai le ka hringna hrilsetuhai, LALPAIN a thungna a na.

en: But deal thou with me, O Jehovah the Lord, for thy name’s sake: Because thy lovingkindness is good, deliver thou me;
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, aw Pathien LALPA, nangin i hming leiin mi thawpui la, I ngilneina chu a ṭhat leiin mi sanhim rawh.

en: For I am poor and needy, And my heart is wounded within me.
hmr: Rimsi le pasetak ka nih a, Ka lungril hi ka sûngah inhliemin a um bawk sih a.

en: I am gone like the shadow when it declineth: I am tossed up and down as the locust.
hmr: Hlim botieng intung tah ang hin ka bo a, Khâuṭhikṭhi ang hin lên hmangin ka um a.

en: My knees are weak through fasting; And my flesh faileth of fatness.
hmr: Ka khûphai hi bu nghei leiin a hrât ta nawh a, Ka taksa hin thâu hrim a put ta nawh.

en: I am become also a reproach unto them: When they see me, they shake their head.
hmr: Anni ihrilsiet ka lo ni tah a, An mi hmu phingleh an lu an thin hlak.

en: Help me, O Jehovah my God; Oh save me according to thy lovingkindness:
hmr: Aw LALPA ka Pathien, mi ṭhangpui la, Aw i ngilneina ang peiin mi sandam rawh.

en: That they may know that this is thy hand; That thou, Jehovah, hast done it.
hmr: Chu chu i kut a nih ti an hriet thei a, LALPA, nangin i thaw a nih ti an hriet theina dingin.

en: Let them curse, but bless thou: When they arise, they shall be put to shame, But thy servant shall rejoice.
hmr: Anni chun ṭawngsie inphur raw hai se, nang ruok chun malsâwm lem rawh, An tho phingleh muolpho an ta, i siehlaw ruok chu hlim a tih.

en: Let mine adversaries be clothed with dishonor, And let them cover themselves with their own shame as with a robe.
hmr: A mi dotuhai chu inzakna puon insiltirin um hai sienla, Zakuoa intuom angin, anni muolphona chun intuom raw se.

en: I will give great thanks unto Jehovah with my mouth; Yea, I will praise him among the multitude.
hmr: Ka bau hin LALPA kuomah lâwmthu nasatak hril ka ta, Anih, mipui laia chun ama chu inpâk ka tih.

en: For he will stand at the right hand of the needy, To save him from them that judge his soul.
hmr: Ama chu pase changtieng chun ngîr a ta, A hringna rorêlpêktuhaia inthawka sandam dingin.
